home.lonelyHint: It's lonely out here. Start by sharing a suggestion!
home.lonelyAdmin: It's recommended that you post at least 3 suggestions here before sharing this site. The initial content is key to start the interactions with your audience.
home.defaultWelcome: We'd love to hear what you're thinking about. What can we do better? This is the place for you to vote, discuss and share ideas.

postFilter.subtitle: View
postFilter.dropDownHeader: What do you want to see?

postsContainer.emptyText: No results matched your search, try something different.

similarPosts.title: Similar posts
similarPosts.subtitle: Consider voting on existing posts instead.

signInProfile.message: Because this is your first sign in, please enter your name.

error.title: Shoot! Well, this is unexpected…
error.message: An error has occurred and we're working to fix the problem!
error.back: Take me back to {{url}} home page.

myNotifications.title: Notifications
myNotifications.subtitle: Stay up to date with what's happening

mySettings.confirmMessage:
We have just sent a confirmation link to {{email}}.
Click the link to update your email.
mySettings.title: Settings
mySettings.subtitle: Manage your profile settings
mySettings.privateMessage: Your email is private and will never be publicly displayed.
mySettings.dontHaveEmail: Your account doesn't have an email.
mySettings.gravatarMessage: will be used based on your email. If you don't have a Gravatar, a letter avatar based on your initials is generated for you.
mySettings.letterMessage: A letter avatar based on your initials is generated for you.
mySettings.imageFormatMessage: We accept JPG, GIF and PNG images, smaller than 100KB and with an aspect ratio of 1:1 with minimum dimensions of 50x50 pixels.
mySettings.apiKeyStoreMessage: Stored it securely on your servers and never store it in the client side of your app.
mySettings.apiKeyDoc: To learn how to use the API, read the official documentation .
mySettings.deleteAccountFailed: Failed to delete your account. Try again later

deleteAccountMessage.part1: When you choose to delete your account, we will erase all your personal information forever. The content you have published will remain, but it will be anonymised.
deleteAccountMessage.part2: This process is irreversible. Are you sure?

mySettings.notReceiveAnyNotification: You'll NOT receive any notification about this event.
mySettings.chooseEvents: Use following panel to choose which events you'd like to receive notification
mySettings.postSubscribedTo: comments on posts you've subscribed to
mySettings.postUnsubscribed: comments on all posts unless individually unsubscribed
mySettings.statusSubscribed: status change on posts you've subscribed to
mySettings.statusUnsubscribed: status change on all posts unless individually unsubscribed

moderationPanel.reasonPlaceholder: Why are you deleting this post? (optional)
moderationPanel.subtitle: Moderation

showComment.deleteMessage: This process is irreversible. Are you sure?

responseForm.mergedIntoOriginal: Votes from this post will be merged into original post.
responseForm.whatsGoingOn: What's going on with this post? Let your users know what are your plans...

notificationPanel.receivingNotifications: You’re receiving notifications about activity on this post.
notificationPanel.notReceiveNotification: You'll not receive any notification about this post.
notificationPanel.subtitle: Notifications

signIn.emailSent: We have just sent a confirmation link to {{email}}. Click the link and you’ll be signed in.
signIn.reactivateSite: To reactivate this site, sign in with an administrator account and update the required settings.
signIn.needInvite: {{tenantName}} is a private space and requires an invitation to join it.
signIn.haveAnAccount: If you have an account or an invitation, you may use following options to sign in.

We have just sent a confirmation link to {{email}}.
Click the link to finish your registration.
signUp.step1Message: We need to identify you to setup your new Fider account.
signUp.step2Title: 2. What is this Feedback Forum for?
signUp.step3Message: Make sure information provided above is correct.
signUp.message: Let us know how we can improve our product. Vote on existing ideas or suggest new ones.

start.message: We have set up the site. Administrator email is {{email}}.
